titleStmt.title: An aunswere to the proclamation of the rebels in the north 1569.
titleStmt.author: Seres, William, d. ca. 1579, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: W.S., i.e. William Seres. This evidently refers to his role as printer, rather than as author, as has commonly been supposed.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A.j." with row of ornaments; the last leaf is blank.
Running title reads: An aunswere to the rebels proclamation.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
